00011 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>

00013 namespace isis

00018 Selection::Selection( const char *entries ): m_set( 0 )
00019 {
00020     int ID = 1;
00021     BOOST_FOREACH( const util::istring & ref, stringToList<util::istring>( util::istring( entries ), ',' ) ) {
00022         const MapType::value_type pair( ref, ID++ );
00023 
00024         if( ! ent_map.insert( pair ).second ) {
00025             LOG( Debug, error ) << "Entry " << util::MSubject( pair ) << " could not be inserted";
00026         }
00027     }
00028 }
00029 Selection::Selection(): m_set( 0 ) {}
00030 
00031 Selection::operator int()const {return m_set;}
00032 Selection::operator util::istring()const
00033 {
00034     BOOST_FOREACH( MapType::const_reference ref, ent_map ) {
00035         if ( ref.second == m_set )
00036             return ref.first;
00037     }
00038     return util::istring( "<<NOT_SET>>" );
00039 }
00040 Selection::operator std::string()const
00041 {
00042     util::istring buff = *this;
00043     return std::string( buff.begin(), buff.end() );
00044 }
00045 
00046 bool Selection::set( unsigned short entry )
00047 {
00048     if( getEntries().size() > entry ) {
00049         m_set = entry;
00050         return true;
00051     } else {
00052         return false;
00053     }
00054 
00055 }
00056 bool Selection::set( const char *entry )
00057 {
00058     MapType::const_iterator found = ent_map.find( entry );
00059 
00060     if ( found != ent_map.end() ) {
00061         m_set = found->second;
00062         return true;
00063     } else {
00064         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to set " << MSubject( entry ) << ", valid values are " << getEntries();
00065         return false;
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00069 bool Selection::operator==( const Selection &ref )const
00070 {
00071     return m_set == ref.m_set && ent_map == ref.ent_map;
00072 }
00073 bool Selection::operator==( const char ref[] ) const
00074 {
00075     return ( ( const util::istring & ) * this ) == ref ;
00076 }
00077 bool Selection::operator==( const int ref ) const
00078 {
00079     return ( ( int ) * this ) == ref;
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 std::list<util::istring> Selection::getEntries()const
00084 {
00085     std::list<util::istring> ret;
00086     BOOST_FOREACH( MapType::const_reference ref, ent_map ) {
00087         ret.push_back( ref.first );
00088     }
00089     return ret;
00090 }
00091 }
